gene.function: FUNCTION: Mediator of cell growth (PubMed:11641781, PubMed:17360971). Modulates apoptosis (PubMed:11641781, PubMed:17360971). In association with STK24 negatively regulates Golgi reorientation in polarized cell migration upon RHO activation (PubMed:27807006). {ECO:0000269|PubMed:11641781, ECO:0000269|PubMed:17360971, ECO:0000269|PubMed:27807006}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:17360971, ECO:0000269|PubMed:27807006}. Golgi apparatus {ECO:0000269|PubMed:15037601, ECO:0000269|PubMed:27807006}. Note=Colocalized with RIPOR1 in the Golgi of serum-starved cells and relocated to cytoplasmic punctae, probably vesicular compartments, along with RIPOR1 upon serum stimulation in a Rho- and PDCD10-dependent manner (PubMed:27807006). {ECO:0000269|PubMed:27807006}.
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: regulation of hydrogen peroxide-induced cell death [GO:1903205]
